column4: this is rather amusing, i must admit :) I have to be logged into X for the machine to connect to the network
though i do not recall if Mono supports VB .net syntax
which, as this is a server, id rather have it wired anyway

if you set it up with network manager, it won't connect until you log in unless you install the connection for all uses (which makes sense in a way, but installed for all users should probably be default)
